transcript.text: good morning facebook friends it is
pragmatic hey I wanted to share a quick
tip with you about how to handle fake
news now that Facebook is in the
business of censoring news stories I
wanted to show you something you can do
to use their own algorithms to report
actual fake news so this morning I saw
this article from CNN politics about the
election hacking by the Russians even
though this story is gaining subtraction
there has been no actual evidence that
anyone can point to to show how the
Russians hacked the election high up
sources in the CIA and FBI have pretty
much said this is a lie so what do you
do when you come across an actual fake
news story well you can do this go to
the upper right corner of the post click
on the arrow and then report post it's
going to give you a series of menus
where you can make choices I think it
shouldn't be on facebook as my selection
continue that got a bunch of options
here I'm going to select it's a fake
news story click continue and then you
have three more options mark this post
is fake news click done and if enough of
us collectively report fake news
Facebook will be forced to do something
about it that is all it's my tip for the
day hope you guys have an awesome
weekend
